name: Dezzan
description:
You can choose a different playthrough style for every level. And there is a leaderboard for those who love to set records. Pass the quests quicker than other players and win your place of honor.

Participate in the development. We listen to the ideas and try to introduce them into the game, and in the next updates, we will give each player an opportunity to create their own levels and combat with friends in the cooperative mode.
